channel.title: SRIAM Ayurvedic Hospital - Ayurveda with Modern Science

item.title: SRIAM Ayurvedic Hospital - Ayurveda with Modern Science
item.description: Sriam Ayurveda, Guntur is an Integrated Hospital Established by Dedicated and Experienced Specialists in Ayurveda, Physiotherapy, Yoga - Marma Therapy, Acupuncture.

item.title: Panchakarma
item.description: Sriam Ayurveda, Guntur have Experienced Therapists in Panchakarma. This process is used for Removing Toxic Wastes from Body caused by Dietary Indiscretions and more.

item.title: Marma Therapy
item.description: Sriam Ayurveda practices Traditional Massage, Herbal, Herbo-Mineral Medicine, Traditional Yoga and Martial Arts ,100% result in acute back pain, neck pain, Myalgia, Sprains etc.

item.title: Acupuncture
item.description: Sriam Ayurveda has Best Therapists Experienced in Acupuncture. Get the Best Treatment for Allergies, Anxiety And Depression, Osteoarthritis, Insomnia, Migraines, Sprains And Strokes and more.

item.title: Cupping
item.description: Sriam Ayurvedic Hospital have Best Therapists Experienced in Cupping, we hugely deal with Joint Pains, Sprains, Inflammation, Blood Flow, relaxation with 100% Instant Result.

item.title: gallery
item.description: Sriam Ayurvedic Hospital has the Best Equipments along with more that 15 Beds and 24*7 Hospital Functionality with Food Diet According to the Patient's Requirements.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Dr. Nagendra Babu, Sriam Ayurvedic Hospital. For any Queries or Appointment, Contact us 24*7 Availability. In case of Emergency, Contact Directly +919573875669.

item.title: about us
item.description: Sriam Ayurveda Guntur, Only || Ayurvedic Hospital || near you, to Research new Techniques gathering information, To Implement Ayurveda with || Modern Approach || for Striking Results .

item.title: Our Speciality
item.description: Ayurvedic Hospital with Best Results in Pain Management in Conditions like Sciatica , Disc Bulge, Cervical Spondylitis, Arthritis , Varicose Veins, Psoriasis, Anxiety, Depression, IBS, IBD etc
